resources.string:
Hello! My name is Ian Valdovinos

 I am learning how to develop applications.

 My favorite color is blue.

 I love dogs but i don't have one.

 I listen to many types of music but my favorite is Latin music.

 I have a job at Kroger, I have been working there for almost one year and I sort of like it.

 I'm about to go to college, I'm not sure where I am going to go but hopefully I go to Michigan State.

 I love coding, finance and social relationships. I'm trying to be proficient in these fields.

 I also love yogurt!

 My favorite food is pizza!
